messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Storage.
